channel.title: Client making help 317
channel.description:
I'm making a client and i came pretty far...
but now i want the looks and stuff...
i saw on other clients that you can add text colours in game... i heard you need to do something in client.java but i cant find out what and how.... something with 0xFF0000 (thats red and i want that colour)
second thing is: i got those old runescape loginbox and buttons...
i searched in the sprites but i cant find them to add some stuff to it you know... so i searched in the Gui and Client.java and the only thing that i found something related to it is this:
[code]Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_966 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1(aClass44_1053, "titlebox", 0); if(i <= 0) aBoolean1231 = !aBoolean1231; aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_967 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1(aClass44_1053, "titlebutton", 0); aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub2Array1152 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub2[12]; int j = 0; try[/code]
so idk wtf i should do with this (i found it in the client.java)
anyways i looked in every file that is possible to find that original loginbox PNG but i dont find it.
so were do i find it to change it?
and why dont you guys make a tut out of this? most people are wondering how to do this.
well i hope you guys can help me out :)
greetz,
Hydra
[i]oke i almost got it on my own.. i got 1 tip for you guys: if you compile and it says that it has a error just fix it!! if you dont and you think a does not matter... well you get backraped by it later lol :P cuz it wont compile anymore things xD[/i]

item.dc:creator: @570fd 570fd

@570fd wrote:

Same problem did you got how to add em?

item.title: Client making help 317
item.dc:creator: @hydra231 hydra231
item.description:
@hydra231 wrote:

i got a few cache files and they are all Dat-file or IDX0-file or something like that…

how to i get it out of there?

Read full topic

item.title: Client making help 317
item.dc:creator: @Czar_y2k Czar y2k
item.description:
@Czar_y2k wrote:

the login box and buttons are probally loaded through the cache then, just change them in the cache.

Read full topic

item.title: Client making help 317
item.dc:creator: @hydra231 hydra231
item.description:
@hydra231 wrote:

I’m making a client and i came pretty far…

but now i want the looks and stuff…

i saw on other clients that you can add text colours in game… i heard you need to do something in client.java
but i cant find out what and how… something with 0xFF0000 (thats red and i want that colour)

second thing is:
i got those old runescape loginbox and buttons…

i searched in the sprites but i cant find them to add some stuff to it you know…
so i searched in the Gui and Client.java and the only thing that i found something related to it is this:

Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_966 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1(aClass44_1053, "titlebox", 0); if(i <= 0) aBoolean1231 = !aBoolean1231; aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_967 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1(aClass44_1053, "titlebutton", 0); aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub2Array1152 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub2[12]; int j = 0; try

so idk wtf i should do with this (i found it in the client.java)

anyways i looked in every file that is possible to find that original loginbox PNG
but i dont find it.

so were do i find it to change it?

and why dont you guys make a tut out of this?
most people are wondering how to do this.

well i hope you guys can help me out

greetz,

Hydra

oke i almost got it on my own…
i got 1 tip for you guys:
if you compile and it says that it has a error just fix it!!
if you dont and you think a does not matter…
well you get backraped by it later lol
cuz it wont compile anymore things xD

Read full topic
